mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_log (log_username, create_time, log_desc, log_duration, user_ip, log_level, log_type, req_param, res_result, req_method) VALUES (#{log.logUsername}, #{log.createTime}, #{log.logDesc}, #{log.logDuration}, #{log.userIp}, #{log.logLevel}, #{log.logType}, #{log.reqParam}, #{log.resResult}, #{log.reqMethods})
